segments.text: My heart is truly racing watching this scene unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just gushing over the sink's edge, a relentless stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the drip, drip, drip hitting the expanding puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so oblivious, completely lost in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She could slip on that wet floor at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And then there's the boy, reaching so high for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is rocking; I can practically see it wobbling from here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's going to tip over any second, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's going to fall, and it's going to be a nasty bump.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't hit his head on the counter or those open cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is filled with such potential danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's hard to just stand by and watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
